description: Displays the details about a resource set, including a list of the resources in the set.

nested_items.name: ResourceSetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the resource set.

nested_items.name: ResourceSetName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource set.

nested_items.name: ResourceSetType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the resources in the resource set. Enter one of the following values for resource type:

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: A list of resource objects.

nested_items.name: ComponentId
nested_items.description: The component identifier of the resource, generated when DNS target resource is used.

nested_items.name: DnsTargetResource
nested_items.description: The DNS target resource.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The domain name that acts as an ingress point to a portion of the customer application.

nested_items.name: HostedZoneArn
nested_items.description: The hosted zone Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that contains the DNS record with the provided name of the target resource.

nested_items.name: RecordSetId
nested_items.description: The Route 53 record set ID that uniquely identifies a DNS record, given a name and a type.

nested_items.name: RecordType
nested_items.description: The type of DNS record of the target resource.

nested_items.name: TargetResource
nested_items.description: The target resource of the DNS target resource.

nested_items.name: NLBResource
nested_items.description: The Network Load Balancer Resource.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Network Load Balancer resource Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: R53Resource
nested_items.description: The Route 53 resource.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The DNS target domain name.

nested_items.name: RecordSetId
nested_items.description: The Route 53 Resource Record Set ID.

nested_items.name: ReadinessScopes
nested_items.description: A list of recovery group Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and cell ARNs that this resource is contained within.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services resource.
(string) ---
(string) ---
